analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ naarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo arūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na kusalam na arūpāvacaram dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ arūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Nakusalaṁ nanaarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na kusalam na na arūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na arūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate pañca
